Dedalus.io_stream.graph_to_sif module¶

” It serialize and exports a Graph object to file, as simple interaction format (sif)

class GraphToSif(graph: igraph.Graph)[source]¶

Bases: io_stream.igraph_exporter.IGraphExporter

It serializes and exports a Graph object to file, as adjacency list

export_graph(file_name: str, sep=None, header=False)[source]¶

It exports a Graph object to a textual file, as sif file

Parameters:
  • file_name – The name of the file where print the adjacency matrix to
  • sep – a separator to separe edges. If none, ” ” will be used
